HiddenText.Name: What is the purpose of the Online Orientation Course?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What is the purpose of the Online Orientation Course?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: The online orientation course helps you map out your graduation plan. By the end of the course you will be familiar with the program, AND see how many more credits you need to graduate. The class really helps students decide if the online degree program is the right fit for their goals.
